# Reshaping for modeling

```{r}
#data_onehot makes every behavior's start and ending into a numeric variable. This should help with our modeling efforts.
data_onehot <- data %>% 
  select(id, dyad_set, Time_Relative_sf, Behavior, Event_Type) %>%
  mutate(temp_1 = 1) %>%  # To fill all true columns with 1, else 0.
  pivot_wider(names_from =  c(Behavior,Event_Type), values_from = temp_1, values_fill = 0)

data_onehot
```
